text:
SOLUCIÓN DE UN SISTEMA DE 4×4 POR GAUSS-JORDAN

Gauss-Jordan [imath] 4 \times 4 [/imath] paors\n[imath]\left\{\begin{array}{l}\n{w-2 x+2 y-3 z=15} \\\n{3 w+4 x-y+z=-6} \\\n{2 w-3 x+2 y-z=17} \\\n{w+x-3 y-2 z=-7}\n\end{array}\right.[/imath][imath]{w-2 x+2 y-3 z=15} [/imath] [imath]{3 w+4 x-y+z=-6} [/imath] [imath]{2 w-3 x+2 y-z=17} [/imath] [imath]{w+x-3 y-2 z=-7}[/imath]
